EmailTemplate.name: TurboWest 2015.Registered Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed: Turbofest West
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{Lead.First Name:default=}} Thank you for registering to attend Turbofest West 2015! Details for your reservation are below. {{Lead.First Name:default=}} {{Lead.Last Name:default=}} {{company.Company Name:default=}} Turbofest West Thursday, February 12-13 The Omni San Francisco Hotel 500 California, San Francisco, CA 94104 We cannot wait to see you at this exciting event. If you have any questions, please contact marketing@vmturbo.com <mailto:marketing@vmturbo.com>. Team Turbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
